meanings.sent1: The elephant was a sizeable animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The sizeable cake was enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent3: The sizeable dog tried to hide in a tiny box, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sizeable as the sun, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sizeable mountain loomed in the distance, casting a shadow over the valley.

meanings.sent1: He received a sizeable amount of money for his hard work.
meanings.sent2: The company made a sizeable profit this quarter.
meanings.sent3: The sizeable pile of laundry seemed to grow larger every day.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, a sizeable sound of joy.
meanings.sent5: The sizeable tree provided shade for the entire park on hot days.
